answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
Tom - right now we don't have the ability to post "job wanted" ads, but one of the improvements coming to the Job Center and Knowledge Network is a resume feature integrated with the user profile. You will be able to turn on/off your resume and employers/recruiters will be able to search.
We have a few other ideas for creating a "resume book" to make available to employers also, as staff time allows to develop that idea.
